website_summaries.verdict: Many people love these pans  because they're affordable, nonstick, and make it easy to bake great donuts at home.
pros: Sturdy metal pans that make 12 donuts for a great price
Donuts come out of the nonstick pans easily and cleanup is simple
Wilton is well known for making quality baking supplies and these donut pans are no exception
cons: Pans don't come with advertised recipes, but they're easy to find online
Make sure to fill only halfway

customer_reviews.title: Great Donut Pan
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. I used non-stick cooking spray in one pan and none in the other, and it is definitely possible to bake some super fine donuts without the spray, actually preferred. The donut pictured is from the pan I did not spray down.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Zbornak

customer_reviews.title: When I received these I promptly made 3 dozen donuts-no ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received these I promptly made 3 dozen donuts-no complaints. Everything baked perfectly and came out cleanly. (I used King Arthur's Baked Donut recipe-in case you're wondering. 😉)
customer_reviews.author: A&R

customer_reviews.title: Vegan donuts galore!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought donut pans for baking vegan donuts!! Amazon delivered them, gave them a quick wash and got our first 2 dozen baked the same night! We baked a Lemon with a lemon zest glaze and a Pumpkin Spice with Cinnamon Maple Glaze! The pans are of great quality, no sticking, even baking and easy clean up! Perfect! Can’t wait to try some more recipes! So much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A great pan for fresh baked donuts
customer_reviews.text: I was craving donuts since having to go gluten free and found a recipe I wanted to try but of course, I didn't have a pan. These were exactly what I needed. Not overly expensive but a nice quality pan. I do oil them lightly and I have had no problems with the donuts sticking. The pans clean up easy. I was afraid the dark finish might over brown the donuts but that does not seem to be the case. So far I have had no issues with these pans and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Tooth Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: Baked a few batches of a variety of donuts. Anything made with flour they pop out great, start using almond flour mixed with wheat flour and they are a lot more moist and also stick to the pans more. Still the pans are nice and made decent.
customer_reviews.author: It's just me

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing sticks to these pans and they are so easy to clean. My kids enjoyed having donuts again since we've made the switch to a healthier diet and treats need to be home made. I'm so happy I can treat my kids again.
customer_reviews.author: Kay-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Used these to make gluten free and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used these to make gluten free and regular baked donuts and they worked great. I still sprayed the pans with cooking spray before putting the dough in and the donuts slid right out of the pan no worries about sticking at all. The size is just a bit smaller than regular donuts that you would find at the store but that really doesn't affect anything. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Non-Stick = True !
customer_reviews.text: Made first batch of donuts today...Keto made with super fine almond flour. Greased with coconut oil first and not one crumb stuck to the pan! Excellent investment. The donuts aren’t super large. They’re about 3 1/2” across. Perfect portion though. Recipe tip: definitely use a pastry bag or plastic bag to pipe the batter into the mold. You’ll drive yourself crazy trying to spoon it in.
customer_reviews.author: HotH2oz

customer_reviews.title: so awesome! I have baked over 15 dozen so far ...
customer_reviews.text: so awesome! I have baked over 15 dozen so far with these pans and every one comes out amazing. Pretty soon I will need to add the large capacity one to my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Rosie w

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality nonstick pans!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Bought these to make keto donuts. I barely used grease and to be honest I don’t think you have to. The pans have such a high quality of nonstick material. They cooked evenly and came out with zero dough sticking to pan.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Yielded some easy donuts! Good medium sized donuts. No sticking and easy clean up! They are stackable and don’t take up much space. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RayJoni07

customer_reviews.title: BEST Bagel pans!
customer_reviews.text: I made the BEST low carb bagels with my pans! Everyone in my family loved these! I didn't have any issues with anything sticking to these pans. I can't wait to make homemade donuts. If you'd like to get the recipe please check out my Instagram @alittlesliceofem
customer_reviews.author: Emily Weed

customer_reviews.title: Great Donuts!
customer_reviews.text: Lemon donuts were a hit! Do not overfill the cavities. I did overfill a couple (first try) and when they were out of the oven, I just used a corer to completely cut out the hole. Worked great. I like these pans a lot. My husband's co-workers loved the donuts. I did too, but I had to send them away. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tip: Oil your pans and placed these on a large baking sheet when ready to go into oven!
customer_reviews.text: Made some delicious low carb cinnamon Keto doughnuts with almond flour! These pans made light work and the results were beautiful delicious healthful doughnuts (with 4 carbs per doughnut!). Hubby now wants his Keto doughnuts everyday! The doughnuts glided out easily I was pleasantly surprised as some reviewers had experienced doughnuts sticking in pans. Quality of these silicone pans feels solid enough to last many more baking cycles!
customer_reviews.author: Hephzibah

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Keto Bagels
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to make Keto friendly bagels for the family! Works perfectly thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Makes Delicious Donuts!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I used a recipe from King Arthur's flour and they turned out great. Make sure you don't use cooking spray in the pan. Most recipes will tell you to use that, but don't! After they came out of the oven I started to think they were stuck in the pan. It was just the extra batter that baked onto the pan that was holding the donuts back. I loosened that with a spatula and all of them came out with no breaks. I would definitely recommend this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Quirky Baked Goods
customer_reviews.text: Honestly,I use these to make everything except doughnuts. lol Your brownies, cupcakes, & even eggs have a certain bit of pizzazz when you serve them in the shape of a doughnut. I love the fact that this set is a 2-pack, it's a better deal than what I've seen in brick & mortar stores.
customer_reviews.author: The Helpster

customer_reviews.title: Only non-stick for a handful of uses!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with these. After 3 uses and only being handwashed they are no longer non-stick! Everything I make in them is ruined now even with greasing them well
customer_reviews.author: Amber Fernbach

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: Wilton products are usually the top-rated, go-to items in many bakers kitchens. These pans perform as advertised - they bake evenly and they clean up easily. However, I had to deduct a few stars because one of the pans had a small dent in one of the cavities. This small defect does not warrant a return since I will be using it in my home, but it negates gifting this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Epigrammata

customer_reviews.title: ... are a decent weight and the non-stick coating looks good. Used them the first time
customer_reviews.text: Pans are a decent weight and the non-stick coating looks good. Used them the first time, lightly greased them and made chocolate donuts. They came out nicely after running a rubber spatula around the edges to loosen the. Its doesn't make big donuts but more of mini-sized donut. I could have put a bit more batter in to make them bigger but wasn't sure how much the batter would rise. Baked donuts aren't like fried but these pans do a good job of baking donuts.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: Making baked doughnuts is delish and fun
customer_reviews.text: I’d been wanting a doughnut pan and when they had it on prime day I splurged. I’ve made all kinds of baked doughnuts. My family is loving this item. It’s a lot of fun. It’s dishwasher safe so easy to clean. I usually put them on a metal pan so I don’t spill any batter. Makes for a quick breakfast when you mix muffin mix up and make doughnuts with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vasinvictor29

customer_reviews.title: Donut bake pans are great
customer_reviews.text: The pans are great. I'm struggling with recipes. I find it easiest to use pastry bag to fill the donut tray so as to create smooth shapes and not mess the center hole space holder.
customer_reviews.author: AmorBIz

customer_reviews.title: Forget donuts... awesome to make bagels!
customer_reviews.text: The food slides out of the pans with ease without any greasing or yucky spray! These were perfect for making paleo bagels. I haven't made donuts in them yet but I know they will work great when I do. They make a 3" diameter treat. I can fit 2 of these side by side on my oven rack and can fit one in my toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!!!
customer_reviews.text: These suck, everything sticks to them, they're hard to clean, hate them, we dont even used them after a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: Lou & Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: These pans were recommended on a recipe baking blog and I am so happy with them. I baked my first batch of apple cider donuts for fall and really happy with the baking process and turnout. Very easy to use and clean. Glad there are two I. This set so you can choose whether to bake 6 or 12. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pans!
customer_reviews.text: We love these pans, thy are almost the exact same size as donuts, and you can use them for almost anything. So far I have used them for muffins, fondant, chocolate, and actual donuts :) The only problem was that the packaging was a little strange, I think the pans could have easily been damaged (though they are very sturdy, so maybe not.)
customer_reviews.author: The Bennetts

customer_reviews.title: The fun of donuts without all the fat!
customer_reviews.text: Work as designed, but you do have to grease them or the "donuts" stick. Kids considered them donuts and I used a recipe that made them less unhealthful than real donuts. Do not come with recipes like the more costly ones I'd seen in a storm, but there a recipes for baked donuts online.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth K. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and get the non-stick - you'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: I thought about saving money and not purchasing the "non-stick" version of these pans and am SO glad I purchased these. They work GREAT. I can't have gluten and I got tired of watching everyone else eat donuts. I've only made them a few times, but they are super easy with these pans. They don't stick at all (despite having very little oil in the recipe) and clean up is incredibly quick and easy. The kids really like them so no more requests for store-bought donuts! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: OMG, I made donuts!
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional product. I’m an avid baker but have never tried to make donuts. I didn’t want to make fried donuts, and had recipes for both pumpkin and apple cider baked donuts. I tried these pans for both, and they worked beautifully. Be sure to use a pastry bag, or a Ziploc bag with a small piece of the corner cut out, to pipe the batter into this pan. Some recipes call for you to clamp the second pan over the first to shape the donuts, but that isn’t necessary. Just pipe in the dough, bake according to the recipe, and you will have beautiful donuts to serve your friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kmkchicago

customer_reviews.title: Kind of excessive/unnnecessary but really fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for baking eggs for breakfast sandwiches because eggs cook fast and thaw fast in this size. Works great for this. I’ve only made actual donuts using a donut recipe and they turned out pretty great. I used a muffin recipe just because I had extra batter and that was fun too. Kids really like this, but it’s kind of annoying size to store since it’s so much smaller than most pans.
customer_reviews.author: bld424

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Edit: 5 to 2 stars. After the first 2 uses these are no longer awesome.... EVERYTHING sticks to them regardless of how I prep the pans. So disappointed! I've tried several batches to make sure its not just how I'm prepping the pans. These are fantastic! Even though they are non-stick I still used coconut oil to grease the wells just make sure! I made some super yummy paleo chocolate cake donuts today and the family loved them! The pans are a good size, heavy weight, and great quality! The donuts popped right out after 5 minutes of cooling. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah GG

customer_reviews.title: Good for regular sized donuts
customer_reviews.text: Did not have to grease the pans; the donuts popped right out and looked great. If making yourself, it only takes about 5 mins to make the batter and then roughly 10 mins to bake. If doing this with kids, takes about 30 mins to make the batter. :D :D But we had a lot of fun, especially decorating afterwards. The donuts are normal sized, not small or large (think cider mill donuts).
customer_reviews.author: FamilyFun

customer_reviews.title: Does show white when folded, still good
customer_reviews.text: Just got these, I am sure they will perform well. Other reviewers have stated the silicone turns white when you fold it tightly, I can confirm that it does. Perhaps Wilton doesn't know but the Chinese factory that made these certainly do. I'm not too concerned. They have a nice thick rim, feels like good quality and the price is still reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden McDougal

customer_reviews.title: Sticking donuts?
customer_reviews.text: The pan itself is great quality. The donuts do not come out that great. No matter how much oil I use the donuts constantly stick & are hard to remove without destroying the entire donut. Of course when buying this pan it is important to remember that you are baking the donuts and if that is all you’re going to do, they will not come out tasting like a donut from the store. 3 stars for the sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: An Easy Non-Stick Donut Pan for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: After finally getting a donut pan and using it, I have to say I really enjoyed it. I made my first batch and they came out really well. It works just like any other non-stick cooking utensil, although I had to flip it upside-down to avoid ruining the donut by trying to pry them off (they were made of coconut flour which is very soft). It came off easily with no problem. I am overall satisfied with this purchase. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Khalil Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Wilton non stick donut pans have become my favorite baking pans .We love Donuts🍩🍩
customer_reviews.text: This is the first set of donut pans that I have ever owned. But, I love them. The price was the best on Amazon because I got 2 pans for what most dealers was sailing one pan for. And, Wilton is a good quility brand maybe even the best because they stand behind their name with a guaranty. My family loves donuts. So, I have used these pans over and over every week since purchased and they have held up great. Non stick every time. Cake mix donuts are awesome 🍩
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Chesser

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Sturdy, Non-Stick
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for making donut shapes. Just don't fill the wells more then half full or so full in order to have a smooth hole. I lightly grease the pan and had no problems removing the donuts quickly and cleanly. Very Sturdy units. It is nice to have two so you don't have to fill and wait, fill and wait for two batches. Fit side by side in oven. I am finding that many baked goods can be made in donut shapes such as cake batter then serve with a scoop of ice cream or whipped cream in the middle. Fun ideas!
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Pans are good quality - Baked donuts a bad idea!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as an experiment. The actual pans a good quality. But the whole baked donut thing is over rated and not worth it.However I could use these to make odd shaped cakes or cookies which is really what baked donuts dough taste like anyway. These clean easily, they shipped quickly, And I have no complaints about the actual pans
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pan to make brownie doughnuts.. worked perfectly. Wiped the pan after each batch and no stickiness. The type of batter you are using is what depends on how full to fill each cavity. The denser the batter the more you have to fill it. I filled it up 2/3 of the way for the brownie doughnuts and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Keto Donuts
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for our Keto donuts and it was a great investment. So far nothing has stuck and it browns them just enough. There are so many easy and wonderful Keto recipes you can make at home and save so much money over the overpriced store bought options. This pan will meet your donut baking needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for doughnuts!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. The crazy thing is that I have not used it for doughnuts yet. I use it for biscuits, cornbread, cookies. I do use a little oil beforehand; but nothing ever sticks. The raised center creates indentations that I can fill with butter or honey or glaze.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to use for making keto do-nuts. I used non stick spray, but still had a lot of problem getting the donuts out of the pan. I am sure that some of the problem is that keto pasty does not have the same consistency as regular donut dough. the pan is well made and sturdy which is a pro, but the major con is that it sticks badly despite being non stick.
customer_reviews.author: Mari-TX

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to make my own donuts, and found a recipe for a baked (healthier) donut! I purchased this set of donut pans, and made my first batch. I wasn't thrilled with the recipe, but, the pans worked like a champ. No sticking, and easy to wash up!
customer_reviews.author: Nutsfordogs

customer_reviews.title: Best donut pans
customer_reviews.text: Love these donut pans, they are flawless. I bought the silicone ones and ended up returning them they were horrible. I recommend these without a doubt. 1st time batch are beautiful and clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Baking Donuts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pans to make baked donuts using a new recipe I'd found. These pans were perfect. Donuts did not stick and came out with ease. My first try and the donuts (gluten-free to boot) I made were wonderful. These pans make a perfectly sized product. I plan on purchasing another set as a gift and would highly recommend them to anyone wishing to make their own homemade baked donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M.

customer_reviews.title: Sticks a lot
customer_reviews.text: It works fine the first two times you use it but after that no matter how much you grease it, it sticks like crazy and the donuts come out with missing pieces. I just ordered silicone donut molds.
customer_reviews.author: SILVIA V

customer_reviews.title: love these pans!
customer_reviews.text: I just discovered bake-able doughnuts so I was looking for pans to make them in. I read the reviews and settled on these. I love them! They are easy to clean and I like that I can make smaller batches since there is 6 in a pan. I can also make larger batches because I have 2 pans!
customer_reviews.author: sprop

customer_reviews.title: Better than Pampered Chef version
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pans. And my toddler loves to get to make donuts out of everything. I was going to buy the Pampered Chef ones... but they were $25 a piece!! So when these got down to $8 for two pans, I gave them a try. They have been wonderful. We have used them countless times. Every time the "donuts" come out perfect and don't stick at all. And after going through the dishwasher who knows how many times, they are still great.
customer_reviews.author: Krista.B

customer_reviews.title: good pans, easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to us to make some keto donuts.... I like the pans and they are well made. I feel the donut cavities could be a little deeper and the 'spikes' that form the donut holes could be a little higher. We end up with 'half hole' donuts (a hole in the donut on one side and no hole on the other). Overall I would recommend these though as they do the job and clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie OD

customer_reviews.title: Poor performer.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to remove finished product without damage. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: These pans are truly non-stick
customer_reviews.text: The donuts pop right out! A tip: when you're pouring the batter, just pour it on the raised part in the middle, let it fall down the sides in the ring, take a spatula, and simply shimmy it on that raised part, pushing the rest of the batter down in the ring. I tried different methods and found that to be the easiest.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great donut pan!
customer_reviews.text: Great donut pan! I but my batter into a squeeze bottle and that worked very well. Wilton consistently puts out quality products and this is no exception. The pans fit side by side in the over and the donuts came out perfect the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy & Tony Dahler

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I had never purchased a Wilton product before, and I am genuinely impressed with the quality of these donut baking trays. They are sturdy, and the non-stick surface is excellent. My donuts baked evenly and browned perfectly. I was so pleased with this purchase that I have since purchased another Wilton product that is also of the same high quality. I am now a fan of Wilton products!
customer_reviews.author: A.  G. Kabel

customer_reviews.title: Happiness at home!
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with this pan set was my first time making baked doughnuts. With the King Arthur flour recipe I found online, the finished products turned out great. My husband is so happy to get his favorite chocolate glazed doughnuts fresh out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Ray and Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of use, they are no longer non- stick. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roe Sang

customer_reviews.title: Not for full sized bagel store donuts but great buy
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for making macro friendly bagels! They definitely not the size you would get from a bagel store but if you’re looking for moderate sized donuts to fit in your meal plan, these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Russomanno

customer_reviews.title: Doughnuts don’t stick at all
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to use, I sprayed a little cooking oil in them before adding my batter and the doughnuts just slipped right out when I flipped them over. The only problem I had was the pan was a little slippery, you just have to make sure and grip it good with an oven mitt. Overall though these pans are great and I can’t wait to use them again!
customer_reviews.author: Angship25

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: The pans are wonderful. Now, if I could find a good recipe, I would be all set. So far, I have made three dozen and they all went straight to the trash! 🤪
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Lear

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So I used these as soon as I got them. Based on other reviews I did not spray them, and the donuts came out perfectly. The only thing that was somewhat surprising is that these are much smaller in size than you get from a bakery, grocery store, donut shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pans
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally new to making any donuts, and I'm vegan so I was a bit nervous trying to make them and how well they might come out of the pans. They came out wonderful and they tasted wonderful too! The only reason I gave them only 4 stars on "easy to remove" from the pan because some of them broke up when they came out, but I think it's because I changed a bit of the recipe myself.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Tumolo

customer_reviews.title: Homemade Donuts Easy as 1 2 3
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans, nothing stick to them no matter which kind of donut I make. The size is great because most recipes I run across are for six donuts only. I sometimes will take the second pan and put it on top of the other pan so I get perfectly round donuts instead of flat on one side.
customer_reviews.author: V. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I came across a recipe for homemade donuts and needed a pan like this. I looked everywhere and could not find, so I turned to amazon and found the perfect t one.
customer_reviews.author: debbie jo

customer_reviews.title: Nize Size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to shape corn flake Christmas wreaths which was a lot easier and less messy than trying to shape by hand. Nice non stick surface and cleans up very easy. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy donut pan!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, straight-forward, and easy to use... not much more you need to know! A good purchase for baked donuts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Donut Pan!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are amazing. I’ve been wanting to make gluten free donuts at home and these pans were EXACTLY what I needed. I’m so happy I went with these pans over silicon.
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Never gotten a donut successfully out of this pan
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to get a donut out of this pan without it being broken and ruined. I’ve greased, sprayed, filled full, filled half full and everywhere in between. Just doesn’t happen. Going in recycle bin a buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves donuts but we don't have any donut shops in our area. I hate frying things so I thought I would try these. They are perfect. Make donuts in about 20 min and clean up really quickly. The donuts popped out perfectly while still warm. We liked them so much we ordered another set.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Five star everything about these!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use a few times before I made a review. First off genius idea, They really hold up to their name and they are non stick even without non stick spray,in-and-out and very easy to clean. I made pumpkin donuts using coconut flour. Holds up very well. I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Don’t put in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 3 because at first they were great the donuts came out perfect. But I put them in the dishwasher and the donuts ended up getting ruined. Do not put them in the dishwasher because it will take the non stick top clear coat off and mess up your donuts. I made this mistake. After about 2 washes my donuts did not come out easy. I’m not sure if this still happens if you hand wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Need Another Set
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I've used these several times so far both with and without cooking spray and the donuts have popped right out. The pans are very durable and cleanup is easy. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for most doughnuts, and very easy to use. I usually just spray the pan with cooking spray - no need to dust with flour. After baking they usually pop out by inverting pan and tapping it, or using a small spatula to remove each one individually. Pan is high-quality. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: I love these silicone pans
customer_reviews.text: Nearly all my baking pans are now silicone. These are great, the little donuts pop right out. The pans clean up very easily, no scrubbing needed. They make my donuts look very professional.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: No strange smell or taste from these pans... Ive made about 100-150 donuts so far and they still simply wipe clean... I do use "pan goop" in mine but thats only bc I prefer the finished product with it... The bottoms are smoother when you grease the pan, if you don't the bottoms look like the inside of a cake (pocked with holes)
customer_reviews.author: Teaah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful donut pans to make great donuts!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent donuts pans!! As long as you grease them well and coat the surfaces, you will get wonderful donuts. We tried them out as a gamble but they really worked out!! Obviously in the photos, the chocolate sauce comes separately 😊
customer_reviews.author: R. A.

customer_reviews.title: Donut anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and would never believe that I could make donuts. They came out excellent. I sent my sister a set and she’s making pumpkin donuts she said they were a big hit. I’m going to use mine for egg whites with everything seasoning on top. Love these
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I made snack bagels in these pans and they turned out beautifully! I greased each cavity before adding the batter and think that added an extra ounce of ease in removing the bagels. I can’t wait to make donuts next!
customer_reviews.author: carolynjbraden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean up well
customer_reviews.text: These are great pans! They clean up easily but recommend you use Pam with flour when spraying. There are Wilton pans with larger donut sizes these are about the size of the palm of your hand. There is also a 20 hole pan with a slightly larger sized Donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Clark

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: These are truly nonstick. I have made both keto donuts and bagels with them and they pop out perfectly. They wipe clean easily with soap and water and don’t even need to go into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality. I am especially liking my wife putting her normal muffin recipes (blueberry, banana bread, chocolate chip, etc) into the forms. Somehow the donut shape makes them even better! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sarahbruce

customer_reviews.title: Thin and short donuts!
customer_reviews.text: Short donuts!!! The donut cavity is too small for runnier batters, so you either get thin and short donuts or a big mess. Perhaps this works great for yeasted donuts -haven't tried yet. And make sure you grease super well bc donuts seem to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McDermott

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: These pans hit all of the marks. I'm super impressed with them & will likely get a couple more so that I can bake even more donuts. It surprised me, but I think these perform better than silicone pans.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Ann

customer_reviews.title: Already Christened
customer_reviews.text: The classic white girl in me has already christened my pans and baked Pumpkin Donuts. Love these! I didn't spray very much coconut oil in these and the donuts just came right out... easy to clean. Thank you, Wilton!
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Does not make full sized donuts
customer_reviews.text: The pan works fine - if you're making mini-donuts. They are nothing near the size of donuts you buy in a bakery or store - the pan is much too shallow for that.
customer_reviews.author: Heldensop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean donut pan
customer_reviews.text: I’m on the OPTavia 5&1 plan and I bake fuelings in these pans. Love them! Even the shakes can be donuts! Will bake the kids some non-diet donuts too :) maybe even mini pineapple upside down cakes! Yum
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: baker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife after she found lots of recipes on Pinterest for baked doughnuts. Works great for what we bought it for. She is still working on perfecting the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Wilton product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make WW-friendly and lower carb donuts for special treats. These pans and Kodiak pancake mixes are the best partnership ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: great donut pans
customer_reviews.text: pans are great. I brush the pans with coconut oil regardless but donuts came out of pan no problem. Size is great. and they clean very easy. This pan is the larger size. The photo shows the large vs the smaller donut. Really happy with these pans.
customer_reviews.author: overseasnow

customer_reviews.title: who doesn't like donuts??
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pans to make baked donuts and it is perfect. With just two people, one pan is sufficient, but I ordered two pans to have when company is coming. They bake good, easy to clean up and I am glad I purchased the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Anne in Al

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this baking pan, I would like if it was a little bit dipper so donuts come a bit thicker but overall is rally good. Easy to clean and easy to use. Everything baked perfectly and came out cleanly. My Vegan donuts came out perfect! Can’t wait to try some more recipes! So much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: The perfect donut
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased with this donut baking pan. Today I used it to make homemade bagels and they cooked beautifully and slid right out of the pan. Too good to be true!!
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great set of donut pans.. wanted to be able to make some donuts with out frying so have now made a few with these and hubby loves.. I usually drizzle a little glaze made with sugar replacement. Very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Snider

customer_reviews.title: love these pans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make Weight Watcher donuts and I am so glad that I did. They are easy to use and easy to clean. They make perfect cake like donuts. I mixed Vanilla cake mix with 2 cups of applesauce and nothing else. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: sclark

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: You are usually never disappointed by Wilton and this donuts baking pans are working perfectly. We used them for our home business bakery and it worked well. It was easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Great for low carb bagels
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to make low carb bagels although a cookie sheet with parchment paper also works. Looking to try it with low carb donuts. I spread a little coconut oil with a brush and its been working great. Used them twice
customer_reviews.author: Diane G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for easy baked donuts!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make a healthy variety of protein donut and they were perfect. They did not stick and were super easy to clean. They baked evenly, I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Landrews

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Non stick, very easy to use and makes the most perfect round donuts!
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove donuts!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pans! This was my first attempt making donuts and I have to tell you I was very impressed with just a tiny bit of oil that I put in the pans and the donuts came right out! I highly recommend these pans!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Keto Donuts.
customer_reviews.text: These pans are really nice, well made, and fantastic non-stick. I coated them with Pam and made Keto donuts that came out outstanding and were easy to remove from the pans once they were cooled. Clean up was a breeze. A great deal for around $8.
customer_reviews.author: RaineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, a nice size, seems to be excellent quality. I was not offered nor did I accept a bribe or other considation for writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Reppucci

customer_reviews.title: Home made donuts  Baked not fried!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been making baked donuts! All kinds of flavors. Lower in fat and not fried! So yummy!!! These are perfect! Easy to clean and the donuts pop right out!
customer_reviews.author: tas522000

product_meta.title: Wilton Non-Stick 6-Cavity Donut Baking Pans, 2-Count
product_meta.description: Making donuts for the family is twice as nice with this donut baking pan set. Perfect for when you want to make just a few, or want to indulge in a little more. Each pan has six cavities and the non-stick coating helps them pop right out after baking, so you can get to eating.
feature_bullets: Make a half or full dozen of donuts for breakfast with this donut baking pan set
Made of steel; non stick coating for easy release and quick cleanup
Each donut pan is 12.5 x 8 inches (32 x 20.3 centimeter)
Dishwasher safe; however for best results, wash in warm, soapy water before first and after each use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars5,716 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
